::DrillBit::

All his wapons are on stand by.
"No one seems to know. StarScream, Dollon, your my team. Goldeneye, your
Killfests. There should be more of are troops there if they listen to
orders. Dark Mouse try to get a estimate of how many enemys we can
expect."
He walks out heading for the Bridg.

::Dollon::

He follows.
